summary: This is an email exchange between two individuals, likely within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, regarding a court opinion and a government brief related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case. The email mentions an opinion under seal scheduled to be made public on August 18, 2021.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the court opinion and government brief being discussed in the email exchange.

events.title: Sealed Opinion Scheduled for Release
events.description: A court opinion on an issue related to the Ghislaine Maxwell case, which was under seal, was scheduled to be made public.

keyFacts: The email discusses a 'Rule 17 opinion' and a government brief related to Ghislaine Maxwell.
An opinion on an issue in the Maxwell case was under seal but scheduled to be made public on August 18, 2021.
The correspondence is between individuals with email addresses from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
